radiographic_examinations.findings: Mucosal thickening in the sinuses bilaterally.
Mild hyperintensity on T2-weighted images of the left mastoid air cells.
Mild swelling of the left periorbital soft tissue and proptosis, no evidence of sinusitis, soft-tissue inflammatory changes involving the right pinna and external auditory canal.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the brain and orbits
radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bilateral proptosis with swelling of preseptal and periorbital soft tissue; partial opacification of mastoid air cells and petrous apexes bilaterally.
Thickening of the right pinna, soft-tissue inflammatory changes, fatty stranding around the right external auditory meatus.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval increase of soft-tissue swelling extending into the postauricular region.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Slightly increased uptake in the right periauricular soft tissues.
Thickening of the proximal left internal carotid artery and vertebral artery walls.
